services.name: Home Building Services
services.description: Home Refurbishment, home rehabitation, home revitalization in Leelanau County, Michigan. We are a full service home building company in Leelanau County, Michigan for new home builds.

services.name: Refurbishment Services
services.description: We provide home refurbishment services in Leelanau county, Michigan.  We update fixtures such as vanities, lights, cabinets and more.  We specialize in high quality materials and custom building.

services.name: Rehabitation Services
services.description: We provide home rehabitation services in Leelanau County, Michigan. This includes kitchen and bathroom remodels as well as updates and enhancements to other occupied and unoccupied living spaces.
